commitResults.messageBody:
Previously, the reference was made to Chi class. However, since
implementing JavaFX, the entry point is now at the Launcher class.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add help command feature's initial stages
commitResults.messageBody:
Users might need some help using the application, especially for
new users.

Hence, with the help command, users can help troubleshoot
when Chi is unable to process their command.

The help command will ideally contain 2 main functionality, a general
help function and to help a specific command.
* help - Lists all possible help options
* help <command> - List how <command> should be formatted for Chi to
understand.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add assertions
commitResults.messageBody:
It is important to check that the number of tasks in the list, after
adding one, is not 0. This verifies that the adding function to the
task list is working fine.

Furthermore, we need to check if the index we specified is based on
conventional array-based indexing and not the indexing used by the
user.

Lastly, we also need to check that tasks are stored properly so that
there will not be any parsing problems later on.

commitResults.messageTitle: Remove some redundant comments
commitResults.messageBody:
Previously, there were comments repeating the code.

Now, some of those comments are beginning to be removed.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor add command
commitResults.messageBody:
Many convoluted boolean expressions in the if block.

Broke expressions down to named variables to make sense of what we are
checking in the if block.

commitResults.messageTitle: Made fields final and reduce magic numbers
commitResults.messageBody:
Previously, fields which would not change after assignment were not
set to final. Also, there were some magic numbers regarding command
length.

Now, fields are set to final to verify they will not be changed. Also,
magic numbers are given meanings.

commitResults.messageTitle: Remove dead code, make method names more meaningful
commitResults.messageBody:
Previously, there was dead code from past task constructors and
scrapped implementation. Also, file writing method name was not
descriptive enough.

Now, dead code is reduced, and the method has a more meaningful name.

commitResults.messageTitle: Change package name
commitResults.messageBody:
Previously, the package name was still duke, didn't make any sense.

Now, package name reflects the actual name of the bot.

commitResults.messageTitle: Change avatar images
commitResults.messageBody:
Previously their appearance did not fit the personality of Chi.

Now, the avatar does fit Chi's cheery personality.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add goodbye message on bye
commitResults.messageBody:
Previously, typing bye will simply terminate the program.

Now, typing bye will trigger good bye message, then terminate program.

commitResults.messageTitle: Finish help command
commitResults.messageBody:
Previously, the help command was incomplete.

Now, the help command has features to assist users who are stuck on
error messages.

commitResults.messageTitle: Change DialogBox behaviour
commitResults.messageBody:
Previously, DB will cut off long content like list command.

Now, the full content is shown.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add styles.css file, change help messages
commitResults.messageBody:
Previously, styling of javaFX elements was done in the element itself.
Also, help message was not properly styled.

Now, styling is all done in 1 styles.css file, and help message is
better styled for readability.

Going forward, help message will have a hyperlink to user guide.
Also, error messages will be more helpful.

commitResults.messageTitle: Edit generic help method
commitResults.messageBody:
Previously, help command message was not styled well.

Now, the styling is slightly more readable.

commitResults.messageTitle: Improve code quality of AddCommand class
commitResults.messageBody:
Previously, there were some long methods in the class.

Now, the methods were SLAP-ed and broken down into further levels of
abstraction.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add more test cases
commitResults.messageBody:
Previously, not many test cases were implemented.

Now, more test cases are added to test new parsing methods and tasklist
methods.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add hyperlink feature to help command
commitResults.messageBody:
Previously, the generic help message had buggy UI.

Now, it the URL is separated from the initial message and there is a
working URL to the remote repository.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add more test cases and improve code quality
commitResults.messageBody:
Previously, there were still some methods in add command not tested.

Now, testing has been made for them. Also, cleared data to prepare for
final screenshots.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix remaining kinks, add User Guide
commitResults.messageBody:
Previously, the message for empty input was not getting printed,
and somehow tasks were not appended on the new line when stored in
data file.

Now, these changes are made. Also, user guide is added to help users
start using the app.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update README.md
commitResults.messageBody:
Previously, README still uses Duke.

Now, full ChiBot README is available on GitHub

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix header
